hindi:
बड़ा हुआ तो क्या हुआ, जैसे पेड़ खजूर।
पंथी को छाया नहीं, फल लागे अति दूर।
english:
Bada hua to kya hua, jaise ped khajoor.
Panthi ko chhaya nahi, fal lage ati door.
translation: What's the use of becoming big, if you remain like a palm tree? It gives no shade to travelers and its fruits are too high to reach.
